Global Menu connects all applications in the EPAM ecosystem and helps to find projects, employees, or applications. You don't need to go back and forth between a huge number of sites or figure out where to find the information you need: Global Menu lets you find what you need in one place in just seconds.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"How to use Global
